title: The Penumbra Collection Review
description:
Before Amnesia, the Penumbra Collection was where you went to be chased by ghouls and creatures through dark corridors. Includes Overture, Black Plague, Requiem, and Necrologue. 
Support the channel at: https://www.patreon.com/mandaloregaming or https://www.paypal.me/mandaloregaming
I take video suggestions at mandaloremovies@gmail.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Lord_Mandalore

06:04 - Overture Gameplay Mechanics
